event.title: was chartered by Governor Benning Wentworth of New Hampshire on June 8, 1763

data.event: Milton was chartered by Governor Benning Wentworth of New Hampshire on June 8, 1763.

event.title: February 1782, the town was first settled

data.event: In February 1782, the town was first settled by William Irish, Leonard Owen, Amos Mansfield, Absalom Taylor, and Thomas Dewey.
The Town House was built in 1849.
In 1878, it was destroyed by a fire.

event.title: made most of their income from lumber and potash until 1840

data.event: Early settlers in Milton made most of their income from lumber and potash until 1840 when dairy became popular and butter and cheese were sold.
